name: Roots of Friendship (6-foot-scale-people)
description:
(This game is made during the 2023 Global Game Jam.)

Roots of Friendship is a 2D side-scroller action platformer game where the player plays as a mandrake running from a giant mole in an underground tunnel and the player’s goal is to save all their root vegetable friends while being chased. The player traverses over different obstacles running away from the giant mole.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Dash: J
